summary: The diff implements most of REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3. Presenting complaint is shown on CaseCard; color-coded icons are added to checklist.ts, CaseCard, and ChecklistEditor; and a PDF export button with landscape table layout is added to both DashboardView and CasesListView. However, the PDF report is missing several required columns (age, surgery date, attending clinician).

missing_requirements.requirement: The PDF table must include columns for age, surgery date, and attending clinician.
missing_requirements.reason: The generateCasePdf.ts table rows include MRN, pet name, owner last name, species, breed, sex, arrival date, presenting complaint, and tasks â€” but there is no column for age, surgery date, or attending clinician, all of which are explicitly required by REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: The PDF table includes owner last name and breed columns which were not listed as required PDF columns in the spec.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies exact columns: MRN, patient name, presenting complaint, species, sex, age, arrival date, surgery date, attending clinician, and outstanding tasks. The implementation added ownerLastName and breed while omitting age, surgery date, and attending clinician.
